constituent: nose, drop, eye, rice field, brains, two hands
heisigStory: Let me share a rather grotesque image to help with this kanji. Imagine taking your two hands and reaching up into someone's nostrils. Once inside you grab hold of the brain and yank it out. At the end, you would have a picture something like that of this character, the full kanji for nose.
koohiiStory1: An Egyptian embalmer reaching both hands into the dead pharaoh´s nose and yanking out handfuls of brain.
koohiiStory2: I sneezed so hard that through my NOSE I blew out my BRAINS into BOTH HANDS.
myStory: mũi. tự ra đồng với hai tay là mũi
